title: Semantic Prompt Search Assistant with Notion, ChatGPT, and HuggingFace
description: HOW IT WORKSThis workflow automatically searches your saved prompts in Notion when you chatwith ChatGPT. When you send any message, the AI agent first searches your Notiondatabase using semantic similarity. It converts both your message and savedprompts into numerical vectors (embeddings) using HuggingFace, then comparesthem to find the most similar match. If a matching prompt is found, it suggestsit to you. If not, it responds normally.The workflow has three main parts: 1. Embeddings Generator - Automatically creates embeddings when you add/update prompts in Notion, or regenerates all embeddings via webhook trigger 2. Chat Interface - The ChatGPT interface that triggers prompt search on each message 3. Prompt Finder - Compares your message with saved prompts to find the best matchSET UP STEPSEstimated setup time: 15-20 minutes 1. Import this workflow template into your n8n instance 2. Configure credentials for OpenAI, HuggingFace, and Notion (see sticky notes in workflow for details) 3. Create a Notion database with columns: Prompt (Text), Embeddings (Text), and Checksum (Text) 4. Set your Notion Database ID in these nodes: "Get All Prompts", "On Page Update", "On Page Create", "Get All Prompts for search" 5. Activate the workflow, open the URL from the "When chat message received" node, and start chatting--------------------------------------------------------------------------------For detailed documentation - visit the GitHub repository[https://github.com/YahorDubrouski/ai-planner/blob/main/documentation/prompt-hub/README.md].
metadescription: Boost ChatGPT with Notion's prompt library for smarter replies using semantic search and automatic embeddings. Fast setup—learn more now!
summary:
Instantly connects ChatGPT with your Notion prompt library for smarter conversations.  
Uses semantic similarity: every chat message and saved prompt is converted to embeddings via HuggingFace for accurate matching.  
Finds relevant prompts in Notion and suggests them, ensuring responses are tailored and effortless; defaults to normal replies if no match.  
Automates embedding generation for every new or updated prompt and supports batch updates.  
Includes a seamless chat interface, intelligent prompt finder, and embedding generator.  
Setup takes 15–20 minutes with easy credential linking and database configuration.  
Comprehensive documentation available for a smooth experience.
